original: 「臣受國厚恩，俯思報效，憂深責重，如臨於谷，定當盡力輸誠，率齊群義，撲討凶逆，以寧社稷。」
text: "The minister receives the country's kindness, contemplates and repays, and has deep and deep responsibilities. If he is in the valley, he must do his best to lose his sincerity, lead the group to fight for rebellion, and to protect the society."
